title: Le Cosa Che Restano
description:
According to the Dutch Volkskrant:

After La Meglio Gioventu, there is Le Cose che Restano

Le Cose Che Restano is a compelling family chronicle in the tradition of La Meglio Gioventu. Central is a tortured family after a painful life event who\'s trying to slowly get back to a normal life. Every family member should complete this course in its own way. Together, the family is a symbol of Italy, a country searching for a new identity.
